Instructions

Hunt the Wumpus is a classic text-based adventure game. Your goal is to find the gold and escape, or kill the Wumpus with your arrow.

Game Elements:

  • Wumpus: The monster you're hunting. If you enter its room, you'll die.
  • Gold: Find this treasure and escape to win!
  • Pits: If you fall into a pit, you'll die.
  • Bats: If you encounter bats, they'll carry you to a random room.

Hints:

  • If you smell a terrible stench, the Wumpus is nearby.
  • If you feel a breeze, a pit is nearby.
  • If you hear flapping, bats are nearby.
  • If you see a glimmer, the gold is nearby.

Controls:

  • Use the direction buttons to move through the cave.
  • Use the "Shoot" button to fire your arrow in the chosen direction.
  • Use the "Pick Up Gold" button to collect the gold when you find it.
